import React, { useState }from 'react'; import { Card, Button, CardTitle, CardText, Row, Col } from 'reactstrap'; function CalculatingDistatance(){ const [distance, updateDistance] = useState({ walking: "0:00", driving: "0:00", flight:"0:00", value:"0:00" }) let walkingSpeed = 3.6; let drivingSpeed = 80; let flightSpeed = 900; const updateValue = ev => updateDistance({ value:[ev.target.value], walking: ((+ev.target.value) * 60 / walkingSpeed /60).toFixed(2), driving: ((+ev.target.value) * 60 / drivingSpeed / 60).toFixed(2), flight: ((+ev.target.value) * 60 / flightSpeed / 60).toFixed(2) }) return(

Add distance in km/h


Walking Driving Flight
)}; export default CalculatingDistatance
